label: Description
value: Vertical sheet depicting two sprays of amaryllis with foliage, outlined in graphite and brush and ink.  The centers of the blossoms are emphasized with red and white watercolor, while the leaves are shaded green and gray.

label: Description
value: Border woven to match 1937-63-3. Neo-classical pattern of laurel wreath and acanthus leaves in the form of a lyre brocaded in gold thread on a bright blue satin ground with a monochrome figure of slender leaves; with wide and narrown gold bands top and bottom.

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle with outcurve base. Blue and white landscape with tall ruined buildings, walled garden at left. Butterfly and birds in air. Base has drapery festoon.
Tile panel composed of six square tiles

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle with urn and flowers in manganese violet on white ground. Shoulder of urn with pendant drapery and band of ellipses enclosing diagonal lines. Continuous vine-and-leaf border with oviform figures in the center.

label: Object Type
value: Tile panel composed of six square tiles

label: Dimensions
value: H x W x D (Together): 25.5 x 38 cm (10 1/16 x 14 15/16 in.)

label: Description
value: Square tile with cobalt blue figure of mounted lancer charging toward the left, enclosed in an octofoil rosette reserved in white on a ground of stippled manganese violet. Heart shape reserves at the corner.

label: Description
value: Square tile with octofoil rosette centered with double walled circle enclosing landscape with shepherd and staff, facing right, in cobalt blue. Ground stippled manganese violet. Heart-shaped reserves at corners with short curved lines along one side.

label: Description
value: Earthenware in manganese, white and blue.

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangles. Each tile with identical pattern of two flowers and leaves on continuous scrolling stem. One flower faces the observer and the other is in profile. Manganese violet on white ground.

label: Dimensions
value: H x W x D (lying flat): 6.5 x 6.8 x 12.8 cm (2 9/16 x 2 11/16 x 5 1/16 in.)
